issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] serialize and deserialize physical plan by serde
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11103](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11103). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is important to send part of the generated physical plan to other servers over the network for distributed computation.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11103?focusedCommentId=17257291) by GANG LIAO (gangliao):*
I found that Arrow’s data type and schema both support serialization into JSON (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3016/files>). Can the community also support the physical plan serialization? Or are there other challenges?

 

If datafusion does not support serialization, we can only extend it externally via this post: <https://serde.rs/deserialize-struct.html#manually-implementing-deserialize-for-a-struct>
